mapper.select: SELECT category as name, count(category) as count FROM t_audio_course WHERE primitive_id = 0 AND shared=true GROUP BY category

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.category, c.create_time, c.owner, c.credits, u.nickname as pub_user_name, count(r.id)>0 AS reprinted,c.share_type FROM t_audio_course c LEFT JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = c.owner LEFT JOIN t_audio_course r on r.primitive_id = c.id AND r.owner=#{userId} WHERE c.primitive_id=0 AND c.published = true AND c.shared = true
AND c.category = #{category}
AND c.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.title, u.nickname as pub_user_name FROM t_audio_course c LEFT JOIN t_audio_course r on r.id=c.primitive_id LEFT JOIN t_app_user u ON u.id = r.owner WHERE c.primitive_id>0 AND c.owner = #{userId}
AND c.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.shared, count(r.id) as reprintCount FROM t_audio_course c LEFT JOIN t_audio_course r ON r.primitive_id = c.id WHERE c.primitive_id=0 AND c.owner = #{userId} AND c.published = true
AND c.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY c.id

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.play_type, l.start_time, l.end_time, l.live_state, l.live_page, cd.img_url as cover_url, count(cd.id) as page_count,SUM(cd.duration) as play_time, p.play_page,p.play_state FROM t_audio_course c LEFT JOIN t_csp_live l ON l.course_id = c.id INNER JOIN t_audio_course_detail cd ON c.id = cd.course_id LEFT JOIN t_csp_audio_course_play p ON p.course_id = c.id WHERE c.csp_user_id = #{cspUserId} GROUP BY c.id
